languages.text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.
languages.original_text: Устанавливая этот флажок, вы соглашаетесь получать обновления, связанные с игрой, и другие новости от <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.
By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

languages.text: Устанавливая этот флажок, вы соглашаетесь получать обновления, связанные с игрой, и другие новости от <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.
Durch die Aktivierung dieses Kästchens, stimmst du zu, dass dir <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link> Updates zum Spiel und andere Neuigkeiten senden darf.
languages.original_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: Durch die Aktivierung dieses Kästchens, stimmst du zu, dass dir <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link> Updates zum Spiel und andere Neuigkeiten senden darf.

languages.text: En cochant cette case, vous acceptez de recevoir des actualités relatives au jeu et aux autres activités d'<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.
languages.original_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: En cochant cette case, vous acceptez de recevoir les actualités relatives au jeu et aux autres activités d'<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

languages.text: 若勾选此选框，意味着您同意接收来自<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>的游戏相关更新和其他新闻。
languages.original_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: 若勾选此选框，意味着您同意接收来自<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>的游戏相关更新和其他新闻。

languages.text: Al marcar esta casilla, aceptas recibir instrucciones relacionadas con el juego y otras noticias de <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.
languages.original_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: Al marcar esta casilla, aceptas recibir instrucciones relacionadas con el juego y otras noticias de <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

languages.text: このボックスをチェックすると、本作やその他の最新情報を<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>から受信することに同意したことになります。
languages.original_text: By checking this box, you agree to receive updates related to the game and other news from <link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>.

traits.locale_text: このボックスをチェックすると、本作やその他の最新情報を<link="pp">Owlcat Games</link>から受信することに同意したことになります。

languages.text: Bu kutucuğu işaretleyerek <link="pp">Owlcat Games'ten</link> oyunla ilgili güncelleme ve haberleri almayı kabul etmiş olursun.
